chapter.text: 21|1|geudeul-e daehan gyesan-i gakkawass eudoe geudeul-eun ajig kkaedadji moshago deung-eul dollidoda
21|2|geudeul-eun junim-eulobuteo saeloun mesejiga ileul ttae mada geugeos-eul jolonghamyeo deudgo issnola
21|3|geudeul-ui ma-eum-eun gyeongbaghago joe jieun jadeul-eun geudeul-ui mildam-eul sumgi myeo isalam-eun neohuiwa gat-eun ingan-i aninyo neohuineun yosul-eul bomyeonseo geu e eunghaneunyo
21|4|geudaeyeo malhala naui junim-eun cheonjieseo sogsag-ineun modeun geos-eul a sinani geubun-eun modeun geos-eul deul-eusi go asim-ila

21|5|bola geudeul-eun malhagileul geugeos-eunkkum-ui chaglan-eseo on geos-eulo geuga geugeos-eul naljohan geos-imyeo geuneun siin ila geuleohdamyeon yeeonjadeul-i seonjodeul ege boyeojueossdeon geoscheoleom uliege yejung-eul boilago hadeola
21|6|hananim-i myeolmangsikin go-eul-ui eo neu baegseongdo midji anihayeossneunde geu deul-eun midgessneunyo
21|7|hananim-i geudae ijeon-e gyesileulnaelin seonjijadeuldo salam-ieossgeoneul myeon mesejileul aneun ideul-ege mul-eo bola
21|8|hananim-eun geudeul-i eumsig-eul seob chwihaji anihan mom-eulo mandeulji a ni haess-euni geudeuldo yeong-wonhi salji mos haessnola
21|9|geuleon hu hananim-eun geudeul-ege yagsog-eul ihaenghasa geubun-i wonhaessdeon daelo geudeul-eul guhago saaghan jadeul eul myeolmangsikyeossnola
21|10|hananim-i neohuideul-ege neohuileul wihan malsseum-eulo han seongseoleul bonaess-eu doe neohuineun ajigdo alji moshaneunyo
21|11|hananim-i joejieun baegseong-eul eol mana manh-i myeolmangsikyeoss-eumyeo geuhue daleun minjog-eul eolmana manh-i sewossdeo nyo
21|12|geudeul-i hananim-ui museoun beol eul alja geuttae geudeul-eun seodulleo domang haessnola
21|13|dojuhalyeo malgo neohuiege ju eojyeossdeon hyeonse-ui gippeumgwa neohuiui ju geojilo dol-aola amado neohuineun jilmun-eul bad-eulila
21|14|ittae geudeul-eun seulpeudoda sillo uliga choeleul jieossnaida lago ha mae
21|15|hananim-i geudeul-eul nas-eulo be eonon samyeolhan sigmulcheoleom mandeulttaekkaji geudeul-ui geu jeolgyuneun geuchiji ani ha deola
21|16|hananim-i haneulgwa ttang-gwa geu saiui modeun geos-eul changjohan geos-eun jangnan i anila
21|17|hananim-i hyanglag-eul nuligoja wonhaessdeolamyeon geubun-ui geos-eulo geuleohge hasyeoss-eulila geubun-eun haenghasineun bun-i sigi ttaemun-ila
21|18|geuleona geuleohge anihago heo wi wie jinlileul deonjini geugeos-ui meo liga busueojideogla wiseon-eun manghago neohuiga myosahan geos-eneun jaeang-i iss nola
21|19|cheonjie issneun modeun geos-i geubun-e soghamyeo geubun gakkaie issneun cheon sadeul-eun geubun-eul gyeongbaeham-e geomanhaji anihago jichiji anhdeola
21|20|geudeul-eun bamnaj-eulo geubun-eul chan-yanghamyeonseodo gilyeog-i soetoehaji anhdeola
21|21|geudeul-eun jug-eunjaleul salgehal su issneun jisang-ui sin-eul seontaeghaessdan mal-inyo

21|22|man-il geu an-e hananim oee daleun sindeul-i iss-eossdamyeon geu dul-eun bung-goehayeoss-eulila ogjwaui junim-isin hananim geuligo geudeul-i myosahaneun geos wie nop-i gyesin hananimman-eul chan mihala
21|23|geubun-i haenghasin geos-e daehaeseo neun jilmun-eul badji anihana geudeul-eun simmun-eul badnila

21|24|geudeul-eun geubun oee daleun sindeul eul sungbaehaneunyo illeogalodoe jeung-geoleul gajyeoola igeos-eun nawa hamkke han me sejiyo nae ijeon-e iss-eossdeon ideul-ui mesejila geuleona geudeul daedasuneun jinlileul kkaedadji moshago deung-eul dolli deola
21|25|geudae ijeon-e seonjijaleul bonae eo gyesileul naelil ttaedo na oeeneun sin-i eobsnani naman-eul gyeongbaehala ha yeossnola
21|26|hananimkkeseo jasig-eul dusyeossda bulsinjadeul-i malhago issdoda hana nim-iyeo hollo yeong-gwangbad-eusoseo geudeul-eunjongyeongbad-eun jongdeul-ibnida
21|27|geudeul-eun hananim malsseum ijeon-e haenghaji anihago danji geubun-ui myeong lyeong-e ttala haengdonghal ppun-ila

21|28|geubun-eun geudeul ap-e issneun geosgwadwie issneun modeun geos-eul algo gyesinila geudeul-eun geubun-i heolaghaneun jaleul je-oehagoneun jungjaehaji anihani geudeul-eun geubun-eul dulyeowohago gyeong-oeha nola
21|29|geudeul gaunde geubun anin nae ga sin-ila malhaneunja issdamyeon hana nim-eun geuleul jiog-eulo bosanghamyeo joe indeul-egedo geuwa gat-i bosanghalila

21|30|bulsinjadeul-eun haneulgwa ttang-i ha nayeoss-eum-eul alji moshaneunyo hananim-eunhaneulgwa ttang-eul bunlihago mul-eul modeun saengmyeongche-ui geunbon-eulo dusyeoss-euna geudeul-eun midji anihalyeo haneunyo
21|31|hananim-eun daejiwie sandeul-eul gojeongsikyeoss-euni geugeos-i dong-yochi mos hadolog ham-imyeo ttohan hananim-i geu an-e neolb-eun dololeul dueo geudeul-i indobaddolog hanola
21|32|hananim-eun haneul-e jal bohodoen jibung-eul dueossnola geudeul-eun ajigdo geugeos-ui yejeung-e deung-eul dolligo issneu nyo
21|33|geubunkkeseo bamgwa naj taeyang-gwa dal-eul changjohasini modeun geos-i geu an-eseo gwedo-e ttala unhaenghanola
21|34|hananim-eun geudae ijeon-e eotteon ingan-egedo yeongsaeng-eul buyeohaji a ni haessgeoneul ttohan geudaedo yeong-wonhal sueobs-eumae geudeul-i yeong-wonhal su issgessneu nyo
21|35|modeun ingan-eun jug-eum-eul masboge doemyeo hananim-eun neohuileul aggwa seon-eu lo siheomhalini ittae neohuineun hana nim-egelo gwiuihanola
21|36|bulsinjadeul-i geudaeleul bol ttaemyeon neohuiui sindeul-eul bibanghaneun jaga i salam-inyo lago geudaeleul jolonghal tta leum-ila sillo geudeul-eun hananim-eul geo yeoghaneun bulsinjadeul-ila
21|37|ingan-eun seong-geubhan sogseong-eulo chang jodoeeossnola naega jigeum geudaeege naui yejeungdeul-eul boyeojulini seoduljimalla
21|38|neohuiga jinsilhan jadeul-ilamyeon eonje i yagsog-i oneunyo lago geu deul-i malhalila
21|39|man-il bulsinjadeul-i geudeul-ui eol gullobuteo geuligo geudeul dwilobuteo bul-eul mag-eul su eobsdaneun sigileul al-ass-eul ttae geudeul-eun guwon-eul badgessneunyo
21|40|geuleohji moshalila geugeos-i gab jagi geudeul-ege dolaehayeo geudeul-eul honlanke hani geudeul-eun geugeos-eul mag-eul him-i eobs-eumyeo yuyedoejido anhnola
21|41|geudae ijeon-e manh-eun seonjijadeul do jolong-eul danghaess-euna jolong-eul hadeon geudeul-i jolonghaessdeon geos-e ewossaigomal-assnola
21|42|illeogalodoe bamgwa naj-eulo nu ga hananim-ui noyeoum-eulobuteo neohuileul jikyeo jugessneunyo geuleona geudeul-eun ajigdo geudeul-ui junim-eul yeom-wonham-e deung-eul dolligo issnola
21|43|animyeon hananim oee geudeul-eul jikyeo jul sindeul-i issneunyo geugeos-eun geudeul seuseuloleul doul sudo eobs-eumyeo hananim-ui bohodo badji moshanola

21|44|geuleona hananim-i ideulgwa geu deul seonjodeul-ege il-yonghal yangsig-eul ju eo olae saldolog haess-eudoe uliga jisang-eul chaj-awa geuui cheugmyeon-eulo buteo chugsohaegam-eul geudeul-eun alji moshaji anhneunyo geuleondedo geudeul-i seunglijadeul-ila hal su issneunyo
21|45|illeogalodoe sillo naneun gyesi e uihayeo neohuideul-ege gyeong-gohal ppun ila geuleona gwimeogeolineun gyeong-gohaneunbuleum-eul deul-eul su eobsnola
21|46|geuleona junim-ui jogeumahan beol man geudeul-eul seuchyeogado uliege jae ang-i issdani bunmyeong uliga joeindeul ila hadeola

21|47|hananim-eun simpan-ui nal gongjeonghan jeoul-eul junbihanani eoneu nugudo bulgongpyeonghan daeuleul badji anhdolog ham ila bilog gyeojassimanhan mugeiljila do geubun-eun geugeos-eul deuleonae gyesanha lini gyesan-eun hananimman-eulo chungbunha nila
21|48|hananim-eun mosewa alon-ege sigbyeol-ui jungpyoleul jueossnani ineun gyeong geonhan ideul-eul wihan bich-iyo gyohun-ila
21|49|geudeul simjung-e junim-eul dulyeowo haneun jadeul-eun unmyeong-ui sigag-eul dulyeo wo hanola
21|50|igeos-i balo hananim-i gyesi han chugbogbad-eun mesejiigeoneul neohuineun geugeos-eul geobuhagessneunyo
21|51|hananim-eun ijeon-e abeulaham ege jichimseoleul jueoss-eumyeo geuleul jal asinola
21|52|geuttae geuneun geuui abeojiwa baegseong-ege yeoleobundeul-i sungbaehaneun i usangdeul-i mueos-inyo lago malha yeossdeola
21|53|ittae geudeul-eun uli seonjodeul-i geugeos-eul sungbaehaessnolago malhaja
21|54|geuga malhagil yeoleobungwa yeoleo bun-ui seonjodeul-i bunmyeonghi banghwanghaessnola
21|55|geudeul-i malhagil nega ulie ge jinsil-eul malhaneunyo animyeon uli leul jolonghaneunyo
21|56|ittae geuga malhagil neohuiui junim-eun cheonjileul changjohasin bun-igeoneul naega geugeos-eul jeungmyeonghaneun han jung-in-i la
21|57|hananimkke maengsehasa naneun neo huiga deung-eul deulligo tteonan hue neohuiusangdeul-e daehanghaneun gyehoeg-eul se-ulila
21|58|geulihayeo geuneun gajang keun u sang-eul je-oehan modeun geos-eul kkaetteulyeossno la amado geudeul-i geuegelo dol-a olila
21|59|geudeul-i dol-awa malhagil nuga uliui sindeul-ege ileon jis-eul haessneu nyo sillo saaghan jadeul-ila
21|60|geudeul-i malhagil abeulaham-ilaneun cheongnyeon-i geugeos-e gwanhayeo malhaneun geos-eul deul-eossseubnida
21|61|geudeul-i malhagil geuleul salam deul boneundelo delyeoola ama geudeul i jeung-eon-eul halila
21|62|i sindeul-eul pagoehan jaga baloabeulaham neoinyo lago geudeul-i mal hani
21|63|geuga malhagil amado geudeul gaunde dumog-i geulaess-eulila geudeul-i mal-eul hal su issdamyeon mul-eobola hayeossdeola
21|64|geuleoja geudeul-eun seolo dol-abo myeonseo sillo uliga jalmoshago issno lago maldeulhadeola
21|65|geuleon hu geudeul-eun suchiseuleoum eulo danghwanghamyeo malhagil neoneun ideul i malhaji mosham-eul jal algo issno la
21|66|geuga malhagil hananim daesin neohuiege yuighajido anihago haeloumdo eobsneun geos-eul sungbaehago issneunyo
21|67|hananim oee daleun geos-eul midneundangsindeul-i galyeonhadaneun geos-eul neohuineun-alji moshaneunyo
21|68|geuleoja geudeul-i malhagil seungli halyeomyeon geuleul bultaewo beoligo sindeul eul bohohala hadeola
21|69|hananim-i myeonglyeonghasa bul-a sig eola geuligo abeulaham-eul anjeonke hala hayeossnola
21|70|ileohdeus geudeul-i geuege eummo leul kkumyeoss-euna hananim-eun geudeul-eul pae baejalo mandeul-eossnola
21|71|hananim-i geuleul guhago geuwa lus-eul baegseongdeul-eul wihae chugbognaelin ttang eulo annaehayeossnola
21|72|hananim-eun geuege isag-eul ju eossgo sonjalo yagob-eul jueoss-eumyeo geu deul moduleul uiloun jalo mandeul-eossno la

21|73|hananim-eun geudeul-eul geubun-ui myeong lyeong-e ttala baegseong-eul indohaneun jido jadeullo dueossgo seonhaeng-eul silcheonhago yebaeleul deuligo iseullamseleul naedologgyesileul naelini geudeul-eun geubun-ege bogjonghayeossdeola
21|74|los-ege jihyewa jisig-eul ju eo bulgyeolhan il-eul hayeo wassdeon go-eullobuteo geuleul guhaess-euni sillo geudeul-eun saag-eul haenghaneun baegseongdeul-ieossnola
21|75|hananim-eun geuege jabileul be pul-eossnola geuneun sillo uiin jung-eseo han salam-ieossdeola
21|76|noaga ijeon-e hananim-ege guwonhaess-eul ttae hananim-eun geuege dab hayeo geuwa geuui gajog-eul keun jaeang eulobuteo guhayeossnola
21|77|hananim-ui malsseum-eul bujeonghan baeg seong-eulobuteo geuleul guhan hu geudeul moduneun saaghan baegseong-iyeoss-eumeulo hananim-eun geudeul moduleul igsake hayeossno la

21|78|dawisgwa sollomon-eul sang-giha la eotteon baegseong-ui yangdeul-i bamjung-e gil-eul jalmosdeul-eo nongjang-eul jisbalb-a noh-ass eul ttae geu dul-eun simpan-eul hayeossgo ha nanim-eun geudeul-ui simpan-eul moggyeoghayeossnola

21|79|hananim-eun sollomon-eulo hayeo geu munjeleul ihaetolog hago geudeul gagja-ege jihyewa jisig-eul jueoss-eumyeo sandeulgwa saedeullo hayeogeum dawisgwa deo bul-eo hananim-eul wihae chansongke hayeoss euni hananim-eun geuleohge hal su iss eossnola
21|80|hananim-eun dawis-ege gab-os-eul mandeuneun geos-eul galeuchyeo jueossnani ineun neohuiga jeonjaeng-eseo neohuileul boho hagi wiham-ila neohuineun gamsahago issneunyo
21|81|sollomon-ege neunglyeog-eul jusa ha nanim-i chugboghan ttang-eulo geuui myeong lyeong-e ttala pogpung-uga buldoleug hayeoss-eu ni hananim-eun modeun geos-eul algo gyesinola

21|82|sollomon-eul wihayeo jamsudeul-eul hayeo geuege sunjongtolog hayeossgo geubakk-ui daleun il-eul hage hayeoss-eumyeo ie hananim-eun geudeul-i geuui myeonglyeong-eseo beos-eonaji moshadolog hayeossnola
21|83|yob-eul sang-gihala geuneun junimkke gang-guhayeossnola jaeang-eulo jega goelobnaida dangsin-eun gajang jabilousigojaaelousini eunhyeleul bepul-eo juobsoseo
21|84|hananim-eun geuui gancheong-e dabha yeo geuga cheohan jaeang-eul geodugo geuga ilh-eobeolin jasondeul-eul dasi eodge ha yeoss-euni ineun geubun-ui eunhyeyo modeun jongdeul-eul wihan gyohun-ila
21|85|iseuma-elgwa ideuliseuwa julki peul-e gwanhan iyagileul geudaeui baegseong ege sang-gisikila geudeul moduneun in naehaneun ja jung-e iss-eossnola
21|86|hananim-eun geudeul-eul uliui eun hyesog-e deulgehayeoss-euni geudeul-eun sillo uiloun jadeulgaunde iss-eossdeola

21|87|yona-e gwanhan iyagileul geudae ui baegseong-ege sang-gihalini geuneun hwa gana tteonamyeo hananim-i geuleul jeab haji moshalila chucheughaessnola geuleona geudo yeoggyeong-e cheohal ttaeneun sillo dangsin oeeneun sin-i eobsnani dangsinman-eul chan mihanaida jeoneun sillo joeindeul mu lijung-e iss-eossseubnida hadeola
21|88|hananim-eun hoso-e eunghasa geu leul gotong-eulobuteo guhago midneun sin ang-indeul-eul guwonhaessnola
21|89|jakaliyaui iyagileul sang-gisikiljini geuneun junimkke guwonhayeossnolajuyeo jeoleul hollo duji maobsoseo dangsin-eun gajang hullyunghasin sangsogjaisibnida

21|90|geuui gancheong-e hananim-i eungha sa geuege yohan-eul bonaessgo geuleul wihae geuui anaeleul jeongsang-eulo hayeoss euni ideul-eun seonhaeng-eul silcheonham-e seo dulleo hamyeo gidaewa dulyeoum-eulo ha nanim-ege hosohago hananim-eul du lyeowo hayeossdeola

21|91|geunyeoui iyagileul sang-gihala geunyeoneun sungyeol-eul jikyeoss-euni hananim-eungeunyeoege seonglyeong-eul bul-eoneoh-eo geunyeo wa geunyeoui adeullo hayeo on baegseong-eul-wihan yejung-eulo hayeossnola
21|92|iseullam-eun neohuileul wihan yuil han jong-gyoimyeo naega neohuiui junim-i geoneul naman-eul gyeongbaehala
21|93|geuleona geudeul-eun bun-yeolhayeoss-eunigeudeul moduneun hananim-egelo gwiuihalila
21|94|mid-eum-eulo seon-eul haenghaneun janeun nugudeun geuui nolyeog-i heosdoeji ani halini sillo hananim-eun geuleul wihae giloghanola
21|95|uliga myeolmangsikin go-eul-i iss nani go-eul-eul dasi il-eonaji mosha nola
21|96|gogeuwa magogeu baegseongdeul-i jang byeog-eul ttulhgo nop-eun gos-eulo buteo swaedohayeo ol geos-ila
21|97|jinliui yagsog-i gakkawa eulttae bulsinjadeul-ui nundeul-eun gongpolo gadeugchauliege ileon bulhwaga wen-il-inyo uliga igeos-eul musihaess-euni uligajoeindeul-ila
21|98|sillo neohuiwa hananim anin daleun geos-eul sungbaehan geosdeul-eun jiog-ui ttaelgam-igeoneul neohuineun geu an-eulo deul eogage doelila
21|99|man-il ideul-i sindeul-ieossdamyeon geudeul-eun geogie oji anihaess-eulilageudeul moduneun geu an-eseo yeongjuhanola
21|100|geugos-e geudeul-eul wihan beonmin ui solineun iss-euna geudeul-eun deudji mos hanila
21|101|hananim-egeseo hullyunghan bosang ui yagsog-eul bad-eun jadeul-eun geugos-eulobuteo meon gos-e issge doel geos-ila
21|102|geugos-ui so-eumdo deudji ani hamyeo geudeul-ui yeonghondeul-i wonhaneun geu gos-eseo yeongjuhanola
21|103|gajang keun museoumdo geudeul-eul seulpeuge haji anihago ohilyeo cheon sadeul-i geudeul-eul yeongjeobhamyeo oneul-eun dangsindeul-i yagsogbad-eun nal-ila hamyeonseo maj-ihalila
21|104|hananim-i haneul-eul jeob-eobeolil geunal-eul sang-gihala taecho-e changjohaessdeus i geubun-eun geugeos-eul dasi changjohali ni geubun-i yagsoghan geos-eun bandeusi su haengdoenola
21|105|geu gyesi ihue hananim-eun ijeon sipyeon-eseo daejineun naui seongsil han jongdeul-i sangsoghalila hayeossnola
21|106|jinsillo i an-eneun hananim eul gyeongbaehaneun baegseong-eul wihan sosig-i issnola
21|107|hananim-i geudaeleul bonaem-eun manbaegseong-ege jabileul bepulgi wihaeseola
21|108|illeo galodoe sillo naege gye siga naelyeojyeoss-eudoe neohuiui sindo ha nanim hanbun-igeoneul sunjonghaji anhgess neunyo

21|109|geudeul-i deung-eul dollindamyeon il leogalodoe naneun naega myeonglyeongbad-eun geos ol neohuiege allyeojueoss-eul ppun-imyeo neohuiga yagsogbad-eun geos-i gakkawassneunji meol-eossneunji naneun alji moshanola
21|110|sillo geubun-eun bakk-eulo deul-eonaeeo malhaneun geosgwa sumgineun geosdo algo gyesinola
21|111|igeos-eun neohuie daehan siheom eulo sungan-ui hyanglag-e bulgwahanila
21|112|geuga malhayeossdeola juyeo jin liloseo jeohuileul daseulyeo jusoseo jeo deul-ui bulsin-eul innaeham-e jaaelousinjunimkke guwonhanaida
